introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to SynchBoard. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our collaborative whiteboard application.

informationCollected.title: Information We Collect
informationCollected.intro: We collect the following types of information:

items.email: Email address (used as your unique identifier)
items.name: First and last name

items.service: Provide and maintain the SynchBoard service
items.sync: Synchronize your content across devices and with collaborators
items.notifications: Send service-related notifications (when email features are enabled)
items.security: Protect against unauthorized access and abuse

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: SynchBoard may integrate with the following third-party services when enabled:

google.title: Google OAuth
google.content: When you sign in with Google, we receive your email address and basic profile information (name, profile picture). We only request the minimum required scopes: email and profile.

gmail.title: Gmail API
gmail.content: When email features are enabled, we use the Gmail API to send verification emails and password reset notifications. We do not read or access your Gmail inbox.

items.passwords: Passwords are securely hashed using industry-standard algorithms
items.https: All data transmission uses HTTPS encryption
items.files: Uploaded files are stored securely on our servers
items.resetCodes: Password reset codes expire after 60 minutes

items.access: Access your personal data through your account settings
items.update: Update or correct your information at any time
items.delete: Delete your account and associated data
items.withdraw: Withdraw consent for optional data processing

items.account: Account data is retained until you delete your account
items.boards: Board content is retained as long as the board exists
items.verification: Pending registration tokens are automatically deleted after 15 minutes
items.reset: Password reset codes are automatically deleted after 60 minutes

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using SynchBoard, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the service.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: SynchBoard is a collaborative whiteboard application that allows users to create, share, and collaborate on digital whiteboards in real-time. The service includes drawing tools, text editing, image uploads, and real-time synchronization features.

registration.title: Registration
registration.content: To use SynchBoard, you must create an account by providing a valid email address and password. You may also sign in using Google OAuth if available. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

security.title: Account Security
security.content: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. Notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.content: You retain ownership of all content you create on SynchBoard, including drawings, text, and uploaded images.

license.title: License to SynchBoard
license.content: By uploading content to SynchBoard, you grant us a limited license to store, display, and transmit your content as necessary to provide the service and enable collaboration with other users you invite.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Content
prohibited.intro: You may not upload or create content that:

items.illegal: Is illegal or promotes illegal activities
items.harmful: Is harmful, threatening, abusive, or harassing

roles.title: User Roles
roles.content: Boards have two roles: Admin and Member. Admins can manage board settings and invite/remove members. Members can view and edit board content based on permissions.

invitations.title: Invitations
invitations.content: You can invite other users to collaborate on your boards. Invited users will receive notifications and can accept or decline invitations.

items.unauthorized: Access or use the service in any unauthorized manner
items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
items.scrape: Scrape or collect data from the service without permission
items.impersonate: Impersonate others or misrepresent your affiliation
items.spam: Send spam or unsolicited communications through the service

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.content: SynchBoard is provided "as is" without any guarantees of availability or uptime. We do not provide a Service Level Agreement (SLA). We may modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time without notice.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, SynchBoard and its operators shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes by posting the new terms on this page. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
